title: Where's my loot?
body:
It specifically says under my profile, "4 chests available" and "Get an S- rating or higher by yourself or with your premade to earn chests."

I have had 3 or 4 S- or better in the last week, the most recent was 21/2/2 with level 15 Ashe (the next nearest was 4/6/1 ), and I haven't received a thing.

Why am I doing this if I am not going to be rewarded for my efforts?

replies.body: As LastShadow mentioned, you are only able to get [**1 chest per champion each season**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233). It does look like you've already been given a chest for getting a high mastery score on Ashe, so you'll need to play different champions to continue getting those free chests.
Have you already earned a chest with ashe this season or any of the other champions you earned an S- or greater with this season? Cause it's 1 chest per champion per season.
